title: Puff, the Magic Dragon Pop-Up Book
description: Everyone’s favorite dragon now FLIES from the page!  Filled with fantastic pop-ups and gatefolds, this interactive book gives kids a new way to enter the magical land of Honalee. Wondrous things happen on every page: Puff’s head and tail lift up, dolphins slide in and out of a paper “sea,” and the boat with billowed sails becomes 3-D. It’s absolutely enchanting!
author: Peter Yarrow
